actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to release the reversionary interest of the United States in certain portions of Camp Withycombe, Clackamas County, Oregon, to the State of Oregon in exchange for a contingent interest in Camp Rilea, Clatsop County, Oregon.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to release all reversionary interests of the United States in two parcels of land at Camp Withycombe, Clackamas County, Oregon. Conditions such release on the requirement that the State of Oregon transfer to the United States Camp Rilea, Clatsop County, Oregon, on a contingent basis.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to release the reversionary interest of the United States in certain portions of Camp Withycombe, Clackamas County, Oregon, to the State of Oregon in exchange for a contingent interest in Camp Rilea, Clatsop County, Oregon.
